headline: Verizon's Outage Outraged Over 1 Million Customers. Why I Just Bought the Stock Anyway.
summary: The news for Verizon isn't all that bad.

headline: 1 Oversold Stock Ready to Bounce Back and 2 We Ignore
summary: Hitting a new 52-week low can be a pivotal moment for any stock. These floors often mark either the beginning of a turnaround story or confirmation that a company faces serious headwinds.

raw.headline: 1 Oversold Stock Ready to Bounce Back and 2 We Ignore
